data.name: Hundred Days - Napa Valley
data.detailed_description:
FREE DLC: Grape Lab

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1681050/Hundred_Days__Grape_Lab/


About the Game

In Hundred Days - Napa Valley you can explore a new american wine region. Use new and old techniques to cultivate new grape varieties and produce your wine.

  • A new game scenario: Napa Valley
  • New grapes varieties including: Cabernet Sauvignon, Zinfandel, Pinot Noir and Riesling
  • New Challenges
  • New tools and structures
  • New aging options and flavours
  • New bottling customizations
